entry.title: US and Brazil lead the world in Covid-19 cases as leaders downplay the virus

media:group.media:title: US and Brazil lead the world in Covid-19 cases as leaders downplay the virus
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump and Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro are two of a kind. CNN's Bill Weir reports on how the US and Brazil are leading the world in the number of coronavirus cases while their leaders downplay the virus.
#CNN #News #CNNI

entry.title: John Kasich: President Trump is 'in a meltdown'

media:group.media:title: John Kasich: President Trump is 'in a meltdown'
media:group.media:description:
Former Governor John Kasich (R-OH) says Donald Trump "is in a meltdown" after the President complained about NASCAR's recent decision to ban the Confederate flag from all races and events.
#CNN #News

media:group.media:description:

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Anderson Cooper: Trump wants us to suck it up as thousands die

media:group.media:title: Anderson Cooper: Trump wants us to suck it up as thousands die
media:group.media:description: CNN's Anderson Cooper says President Donald Trump's claim that coronavirus is "99% harmless" is another example of the president never being in the fight against Covid-19 in the first place. #Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Top Obama strategist says Trump's tactics aren't working

media:group.media:title: Top Obama strategist says Trump's tactics aren't working
media:group.media:description:
White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany refused to denounce the Confederate flag during a press briefing after President Donald Trump bemoaned NASCAR's recent decision to ban it from all races and events. CNN's David Axelrod analyzes Trump's strategy of stoking racial divide in the nation to gain re-election.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump tweets Bubba Wallace should apologize to NASCAR

media:group.media:title: Trump tweets Bubba Wallace should apologize to NASCAR
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump bemoaned NASCAR's recent decision to ban the Confederate flag from all races and events. "Has @BubbaWallace apologized to all of those great NASCAR drivers & officials who came to his aid, stood by his side, & were willing to sacrifice everything for him, only to find out that the whole thing was just another HOAX? That & Flag decision has caused lowest ratings EVER!" Trump tweeted. As the coronavirus pandemic rages across the country, Trump has largely moved on, seeking instead to place focus on his "law and order" message through a series of inflammatory speeches, tweets, and statements defending racist monuments and digging in his opposition to renaming Army bases named for Confederate leaders. The "Flag decision" in Trump's tweet appears to link NASCAR's decision to remove Confederate flag imagery from all races and events with lower ratings. Last month, amid nationwide protests following the killing of George Floyd by Minneapolis police officers NASCAR banned the flag, a racist symbol. #Trump #BubbaWallace #CNN

entry.title: McEnany defends Trump tweet on NASCAR and confederate flag

media:group.media:title: McEnany defends Trump tweet on NASCAR and confederate flag
media:group.media:description: White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany defended President Donald Trump's tweet bemoaning NASCAR's recent decision to ban the Confederate flag from all races and events. "Has @BubbaWallace apologized to all of those great NASCAR drivers & officials who came to his aid, stood by his side, & were willing to sacrifice everything for him, only to find out that the whole thing was just another HOAX? That & Flag decision has caused lowest ratings EVER!" Trump tweeted. As the coronavirus pandemic rages across the country, Trump has largely moved on, seeking instead to place focus on his "law and order" message through a series of inflammatory speeches, tweets, and statements defending racist monuments and digging in his opposition to renaming Army bases named for Confederate leaders. The "Flag decision" in Trump's tweet appears to link NASCAR's decision to remove Confederate flag imagery from all races and events with lower ratings. Last month, amid nationwide protests following the killing of George Floyd by Minneapolis police officers NASCAR banned the flag, a racist symbol. #Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: FDA commissioner refuses to defend Trump claim

media:group.media:title: FDA commissioner refuses to defend Trump claim
media:group.media:description: Commissioner of the US Food and Drug Administration Dr. Stephen Hahn declined to defend President Donald Trump's unfounded claim that 99% of coronavirus cases are "totally harmless" and repeatedly refused to say whether Trump's remark is true or false. #CNN #News

entry.title: Fareed: Coronavirus won't be a death knell for big cities. Here's why

media:group.media:title: Fareed: Coronavirus won't be a death knell for big cities. Here's why
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Fareed Zakaria explains how previous pandemics affected big cities throughout history, and why coronavirus won't be any different.
#CNN #News
